verses.roman:
jaya jaya gauracandra jaya nityānanda
jayādvaita-candra jaya gaura-bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; gauracandra—to Lord Gauracandra (Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu); jaya—all glories; nityānanda—to Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; jaya—all glories; advaita-candra—to Śrī Advaita Gosāñi; jaya—all glories; gaura-bhakta-vṛnda—to the devotees of Lord Caitanya.
translation: All glories to Lord Gauracandra! All glories to Nityānanda Prabhu! All glories to Advaita Prabhu! And all glories to the devotees of Lord Caitanya headed by Śrīvāsa Ṭhākura!
